My name is David Shawe and I'm a designer from Northern Ireland.

About Me

I'm a 29 year old designer that loves the web. I was born in 1989, this means I have grown up living with the internet. I graduated in 2011 and I currently work within Email Marketing.

Podcast

I've just launched a personal podcast, you can listen here.

Work

I run my own business and trade as Invisible Building. We sell web to local business and creatives.

Contact

Send mail to david@invisiblebuilding.com
